title: Chasuble
medium:
Medium: silk, gold, silver, linen
Technique: embroidery in couching and satin stitches
description: Chasuble of white silk entirely covered with gold and silver embroidery, backed with white linen and lined with red silk.  Background of couched silver, with ornamental foliage in couched gold thread and some blossoms in polychrome silk floss.
name: Chasuble
